title: Accomodate the palace
text:
There is a big palace in which rooms are constructed in the from of a square matrix. Now these rooms have to be filled with people.As there are conflicts between people to maintain the equilibrium total number of people must be odd in  every row and every column.A room can accommodate only a single person.Given the size of palace N one has to find total number of ways people can be accommodated.InputFirst line consists of an integer K and then K test cases follow.OutputFor each test case you have to output the result%98777 in a separate line.ExampleInput:1
3Output:16
